text: Peter Sonski (born July 11, 1962) is an American former radio host and politician. He was an elected member of Connecticut's Regional School District 17 Board of Education. He was also the director of the Knights of Columbus Museum. He is a member of the American Solidarity Party. In June 2023, Sonski was nominated as the American Solidarity Party nominee for president in the 2024 presidential election. ==References== ==Other websites== * Peter Sonski 2024 Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:American radio personalities Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Politicians from Connecticut Category:2024 United States presidential candidates
title: Peter Sonski
